text: Once, for some weeks King Krishnadevaraya had been Solemn and sad.
He seemed to be lost in his own thoughts all the time.
All the courtiers noticed this and were worried.
They had discussions to bring the king to his normal routine.
your majesty,
Let us have a music and drama festival in our kingdom.
Or, shall we perform a ritual yagnya for the Kingdom's prosperity?
Your majesty, I think we should hold on display our army skills and artillery.
When all of them were speaking, Tenali  Raman sat silently in his chair.
What Tenali  Rama?
Won't you suggest something for me?
Your majesty,
Today morning, I saw the most beautiful flowers on earth.
If you wish, you can see them too.
Is that so? I would love to see them.
So the king, the commander-in-Chief and some courtiers accompanied Tenali Rama.
Soon they reached a large open ground,
where many children were playing.
The King saw all this and went near the children.
He started to play with them,
forgetting that he was the king.
He enjoyed with the children. He played with them all day long.
The ministers and Tenali Raman felt happy to see the King.
Tenali, sitting amidst children, makes one feel like a child.
Isn't it,  Tenali Rama?
This pleasure is uncomparable.
This makes me forget all my worries.
It's true your majesty
Playing with children gives us inner peace.
It is like praying to God.
That is why people say that children have the qualities of God.
But Tenali, you are supposed to show me the most beautiful flowers on earth.
Where are they ?
Didn't you see them just now?
These children are earth's most beautiful flowers.
You're right Tenali.
These children have washed away all my worries.
Now,
I'll visit these children every month.
Minister,
provide these  children with all the toys that they need.
Dear children, you are the Earth's most beautiful flowers.
Everybody loves you.
Be proud and make people happy around you.
